archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.3.5b: b) equipment (e.g. using file-based encryption to protect electronic files stored on mobile devices, removable media and in transit; and password-protecting consumer devices)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
